mapper.select: select * from buy_bid where item_num=#{item_num} and buy_num=#{buy_num}
select * from sell_bid where item_num=#{item_num} and buy_num=#{sell_num}
select * from item order by item_num
select buy_size, buy_wishprice, count(*) as count from buy_bid where item_num = #{item_num} group by buy_size, buy_wishprice
select sell_size, sell_wishprice, count(*) as count from sell_bid where item_num = #{item_num} group by sell_size, sell_wishprice
